titleStmt.title: The historie of Corah, Dathan, and Abiram, & c Numb. 16. Chap. Applied to the prelacy ministerie and church-assemblies of England. By Mr Iohn Penry, a martyr of Iesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Penry, John, 1559-1593.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Running title reads: Of the ministrie of the Church of Engl.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
